txt.en: The bodies of fallen dwarves have been taken to Mullach Cagar, where they are used in rituals to create wights.
You have prevented many fallen dwarves from being made into wights.\n\nYou should return to Molkha in the valley.
Talk to Molkha in the valley

You have found the remains of a fallen dwarf in a ritual circle. This body is rather fresh, which means it was not taken from an ancient crypt and was likely a Longbeard of the Gabil'akk√¢. You cannot allow this dwarf to be dishonoured in this way. You should burn the body and any others in Mullach Cagar before the Angmarim turn them into wights.
You have found dwarf bodies are being used in Angmarim rituals to make wights.\n\nYou should burn dwarf bodies in Mullach Cagar.
'The Angmarim had moved recently fallen dwarves to Mullach Cagar, and were using foul rituals to turn them into wights? Those monsters! Thank you for keeping the honoured dead from such a fate.'
